name: William Worm
description:
!! ATTENTION FIREFOX USERS !!

Firefox does not correctly scale the view window. You can use another chromium based brower (edge ect) or download the windows executable.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
  • U/Z - Undo
  • R - Restart

You can compete for the lowest amount of steps in any level. Post any impressive scores in the comments!

More levels coming soon... (?) and possibly even a level creator.
